core_meaning: Square between Sun and Saturn drives friction/work. Sun: ego, identity, authority, vitality, purpose, visibility. Saturn: discipline, structure, time, limits, dharma via effort. General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

facets.career: Authority, recognition, leadership, alignment with purpose.  Authority via mastery, long-term credibility. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.relationships: Self-respect, healthy boundaries, paternal figures.  Commitment realism, boundaries, duty. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.money: Status-linked income, government/authority-linked gains.  Slow steady accrual, austerity, debt realism. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.health_adj: Heart, vitality, heat regulation; consider circadian rhythm.  Bones, teeth, chronic load; routines & posture. Emphasis: friction/work.

risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.
Burnout via over-responsibility; schedule recovery windows.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: friction/work).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: friction/work).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: friction/work).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: friction/work).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: friction/work).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: friction/work).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

en.title: Sun Square Saturn
en.core: Square between Sun and Saturn drives friction/work. Sun: ego, identity, authority, vitality, purpose, visibility. Saturn: discipline, structure, time, limits, dharma via effort. General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

hi.title: Sun Square Saturn (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Sun और Saturn का Square — ऊर्जा friction/work के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
